entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Lanaudière
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:24 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
